name: realtime-bpm-analyzer
description: This dependency free library can analyze the BPM (Tempo) of an audio/video node or any stream in realtime on your browser

scripts.build: npm run build:index && npm run build:index:esm && npm run build:realtime:processor && npm run build:types
scripts.build:favicons: npm run build:favicons:images && npm run build:favicons:inject
scripts.build:favicons:inject: npm run build:favicons:inject:root && npm run build:favicons:inject:classes && npm run build:favicons:inject:functions && npm run build:favicons:inject:types
scripts.build:types: npm run build:types:index && npm run build:types:realtime:processor
scripts.dev: rm -Rf dist && npm run build && rm -Rf ../allegro/.next/ && rm -Rf ../allegro/node_modules/realtime-bpm-analyzer/dist/ && mkdir ../allegro/node_modules/realtime-bpm-analyzer/dist/ && cp ./dist/* ../allegro/node_modules/realtime-bpm-analyzer/dist/
scripts.doc: rm -Rf docs && npm run build:typedoc && npm run build:favicons && npm run build:docs:sitemap && npm run build:docs:seo && npm run build:docs:assets
scripts.deploy: rm -Rf docs && npm run doc && gh-pages -d docs -b gh-pages
scripts.release:after: npm test && npm run coverage && npm run build && npm publish && npm run deploy
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:before && standard-version --release-as patch && git push && npm run release:after
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:before && standard-version --release-as minor && git push && npm run release:after
scripts.release:major: npm run release:before && standard-version --release-as major && git push && npm run release:after
